title: DatatableColumn
description: A column of data within a `Datatable`.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

values.description: The data values of the column.
values.$comment:
Previously, any `Node` type was allowed in values. However, for some implementations
this was inefficient (e.g. in Rust a `enum Node` is >500 bytes whereas a `enum Primitive` is 32 bytes).

validator.description: The validator to use to validate data in the column.
